sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Spirituall food, and physick vis. Milke for the younger. Meat for the stronger. The substance of diuinitie. A pill to purge out poperie. Pill to purge out poperie Mico, John. Mico, John. A pill to purge out poperie.
The second edition, corrected and inlarged.
[14], 165, [9] p.
Printed by H. L[ownes] for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster Row, at the signe of the Talbot, London : 1623.
By John Mico. Printer's name from STC. An edition, corrected and enlarged, of: Mico, John. A pill to purge out poperie. Formerly also STC 17141a. The second edition of STC 17858, published in 1623 with title: A pill to purge out poperie, which is reprinted in this edition. Some print faded and show-through. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
=======

The second edition, corrected and inlarged.
[14], 165, [9] p.
Printed by H. L[ownes] for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at his shop in Pater-noster Row, at the signe of the Talbot, London : 1623.
By John Mico. Printer's name from STC. An edition, corrected and enlarged, of: Mico, John. A pill to purge out poperie. Formerly also STC 17141a. The second edition of STC 17858, published in 1623 with title: A pill to purge out poperie, which is reprinted in this edition. Some print faded and show-through. Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
Beniamin Fisher
H. L[ownes]
his shop in Pater-noster Row, at the signe of the Talbot
